text:
From the sysadmin reddit forum Not in October, no ETA thedivinehairband ·4 days ago
 Hoping to see them fixing the cURL vulnerability in this one. :crossed_fingers: Our security team have jumped right on that this month. 30 FCA162 ·3 days ago
 I received this reply from Microsoft: "The curl CVE is currently under review from us, NOT included in October release and if feasible will be included in one of the future releases" User avatar [https://styles.redditmedia.com/t5_bkv2u/styles/profileIcon_snoo5386922a-cbf0-410b-bd1a-c6af0cc63529-headshot.png?width=256&height=256&crop=256:256,smart&s=1baefd44bbd23b5a1789008becd3aa10f4e76c5f] level 3 Mvalpreda ·3 days ago Jack of All Trades Another month of failing that one on Nessus. Grrrrrr
